entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 27 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
